TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit Membership extends Microsoft.Office.Server.UserProfiles.PrivacyItem

Docs.summary: Represents a single user's membership in a single member group.

remarks.para: Membership is a first-class object in the UserProfiles object model. You can get to the memberships from the UserProfile object.

For more information about types of membership groups, see Memberships Overview. For a code example about how to create a member group and add a member to the newly created group, see How to: Create Memberships.
